titles: Die Mercurii 3. April. 1644. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, for the incouragement and security of all such vvell-affected persons as shall forthwith advance any summes of money to enable the Committee of the Militia, speedily to send forth and maintaine a considerable number of horse and foot, for the pursute of that great victory which Almighty God hath given the Parliament forces, under command of Sir William Waller, and Sir William Belfour.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "[illegible] the fourth volume:".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
